# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by the .NET SDK

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates
*.userprefs

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/

# Visual Studio
.vs/

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Logs
*.log
app.log

# Environment files
.env
.env.*

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets

# IIS / publish output
_PublishedWebsites/
publish/
wwwroot/

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*.swo

# Backup files
*.orig

# Rider / JetBrains
.idea/

# Test results
TestResults/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# macOS and Windows system files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Git
.gitignore
